comments:
F3

If I specify a bogus image for a feature in Eclipse I will get a crash.
STEPS
1) Create a feature project
2) Set the image to build.xml
3) At some point you will get the following error which will crash Eclipse. I am
not sure how I got it as it happened while I was entering a PR elsewhere.

Error messagre to the console
Unhandled

F4 candidate.

Value: guard against bad user input. 
Risk: low ... add try/catch for this
Fixed by catching SWTException and setting image to the default image.
